_comment: Steam Vault Escape - Balance Configuration v1.0
_description: Edit these values to adjust game balance. Reload the page to see changes take effect.

economy._comment: Core economy values - costs and purchasing
economy._drawCost_description: Keys required to draw a new game for an empty shop slot
economy._redrawCost_description: Keys required to redraw a different game during the draw process
economy._unlockCostMultiplier_description: Multiplier for shop unlock costs (higher = more expensive). Costs are based on YOUR PLAYTIME ONLY. Cheap: 500-800, Moderate: 1000-2500, Epic: 3000-5000. Try 0.1 to make everything 10x cheaper (fixes 'too expensive' issue).

progression._comment: Power generation and game drain mechanics
progression._clickValueMultiplier_description: Multiplier for Collection Power per click (higher = faster progression). Base formula: floor(steam_hours_played) × multiplier. Try 2.0 for double power.
progression._maxPowerMultiplier_description: How many clicks a game can give before draining. Formula: clickValue × multiplier. Default 100 means a game gives 100 clicks worth of power. Lower = games drain faster.
progression._passiveRegenRatePercent_description: Percentage of max power regenerated per second (0.5 = 0.5% per second = full regen in ~200 seconds). Higher = faster recovery.
progression._regenCooldownSeconds_description: Seconds to wait after draining a game before passive regen kicks in. Lower = regen starts sooner.
progression._refreshCostMultiplier_description: Multiplier for key cost to manually refresh a drained game. Formula: clickValue × multiplier. Higher = more expensive to refresh.

rewards._comment: Key Game rewards and liberation system
rewards._keyRewardMultiplier_description: Multiplier for keys earned from playing Key Games. Formula: metacritic × multiplier. Try 2.0 for double keys, 0.5 for half.
rewards._keyGameMinMinutes_description: Minutes of playtime required to complete a Key Game and earn keys. Lower = easier to earn keys.
rewards._autoRefreshOnKeyComplete_description: Whether completing a Key Game automatically refreshes all drained games for free (true = yes, false = no)

tiers._comment: Shop tier thresholds - determines cheap/moderate/epic classification. NOTE: Base unlock costs (before multiplier) are Cheap: 500-800, Moderate: 1000-2500, Epic: 3000-5000 based on YOUR playtime.
tiers._cheapMaxCost_description: Maximum unlock cost for 'cheap' tier games (< 2 hours playtime). Games under this cost are considered cheap/common. Affects shop slot patterns.
tiers._moderateMaxCost_description: Maximum unlock cost for 'moderate' tier games (2-10 hours playtime). Games between cheapMax and moderateMax are moderate rarity. Games above this are epic/legendary (10+ hours playtime).

startingGame._comment: Criteria for selecting the first playable game (with fallbacks)
startingGame._metacriticMin_description: OPTIONAL filter: Minimum Metacritic score for ideal starting game. Falls back to any 5-10 hour game if no matches found.
startingGame._metacriticMax_description: OPTIONAL filter: Maximum Metacritic score for ideal starting game. Falls back to any 5-10 hour game if no matches found.
startingGame._hoursPlayedMin_description: Preferred minimum hours played on Steam for starting game selection. Falls back to lowest playtime game if no matches.
startingGame._hoursPlayedMax_description: Preferred maximum hours played on Steam for starting game selection. Falls back to lowest playtime game if no matches.

defaults._comment: Fallback values when external API data is unavailable
defaults._defaultMetacritic_description: Default Metacritic score used for KEY REWARDS when game has no rating data from Steam Store API. This determines how many keys you earn from unplayed games.
defaults._defaultHoursTobeat_description: LEGACY/UNUSED: Hours to beat fallback (not currently used in cost calculations since we use YOUR playtime instead).

advanced._comment: Advanced tuning - only change if you know what you're doing
advanced._minClickValue_description: Minimum Collection Power per click (even if steam hours = 0)
advanced._minRefreshCost_description: Minimum key cost to refresh a game (even if clickValue is very low)
advanced._playtimeBasedUnlockCosts_description: Use playtime-only formula instead of metacritic×hours formula for unlock costs. Set to true if you want costs purely based on your playtime, ignoring game quality.
